price: 1. Nabiyow! Maxaad uga xarrimeysaa (Naftaada) wuxuu Alle kuu xalaaaleeyey si aad u raalli geliso xaasaskaaga? Allese waa Denbi Dhaaf Badane, Naxariis badan.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ لِمَ تُحَرِّمُ مَآ أَحَلَّ ٱللَّهُ لَكَۖ تَبۡتَغِي مَرۡضَاتَ أَزۡوَٰجِكَۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nabiyu lima tuḥarrimu mā aḥalla al-lahu laka tabtaghī marḍāta azwājika wal-lahu ghafūrun raḥīmun
